tool_description: A database with a collection of technical specs of thousands of cars.
name: Automotive Car Specs
title: Automotive Car Specs

api_list.name: Get Brand Vehicle Spec
api_list.url: https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/audi/a3/A3 (8V facelift 2016)/2.0 TFSI (190 Hp) quattro S tronic
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the specifications of a car by Generation and Engine Modification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/audi/a3/A3 (8V facelift 2016)/2.0 TFSI (190 Hp) quattro S tronic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com/cars/specs/{brand}/{model}/{generation}/{modification}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "automotive-car-specs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
